bug.author: apc999
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.0 Describe the bug Hive creates temp directories like <table_location>/.hive-staging_hive_<date>_<time>-xx/-ext-xxxxx. Currently, with Async through write mode, Alluxio will still persist files like this. To Reproduce Running lower Hive versions like 1.2 Expected behavior These are files not expected to persist. Having them persist will cause issues as the persist jobs may conflict with final rename as the commit Urgency High Additional context

comments.comment: Close this PR as it is solved by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/pull/10111>#10111</denchmark-link>
